@Module.Name: Select
@Module.Description: This module is a selection model, selecting the 5 possible component without relativity ranking to be acted on catering to user's intent
@Module.Note: This individual module only select 5 highly related components,without ranking them,and without analyzing the correctness of the components aligning with user's content

Output.<switch id=6 class='com.google.android.d: This switch component represents the 'Display time with seconds' setting. Toggling the switch would turn on or off the display of time with seconds. This is directly related to the user's intent of changing the clock format.
Output.<switch id=8 class='com.google.android.d: This switch component represents the 'Automatic home clock' setting. Toggling the switch would enable or disable the automatic addition of a home clock when traveling to a different time zone. While not directly related to the user's intent, it is a potential setting that the user may want to explore.
Output.<div id=5 class='' > Automatic home cloc: This div component likely contains additional clock settings. It is worth exploring as it may contain options related to the clock format, such as 24-hour format.
Output.<div id=4 class='' > Home time zone\n: This div component likely contains additional clock settings. It is worth exploring as it may contain options related to time and date settings in general.
Output.<div id=3 class='' > Change date & time: This div component likely contains additional clock settings. It is worth exploring as it may contain options related to changing the home time zone, which could potentially affect the clock format.
